casebody.data:
99-0653 (La. 4/23/99)

LAW ENFORCEMENT DISTRICT OF The PARISH OF AVOYELLES v. AVOYELLES PARISH POLICE JURY, V.W. Cole, Raymond Luneau, Tommy Maddie and Steve Lacombe. No. 99-C-0653. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Knoll, Eddie Avoyelles Par/ DA; — Other(s); Applying for Writ of Cer-tiorari and/or Review; Parish of Avoyelles 12th Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 97-4442; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-0996

Denied.

KNOLL, J. not on panel; recused.
